short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate distractions, boost productivity, stay focused and achieve your goals with this tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your focus and skyrocket your productivity with Brain Boost â€“ the ultimate Chrome extension for a distraction-free online experience. Whether you're studying for exams, working on high-stakes projects, or simply trying to concentrate on reading, Brain Boost is your personal digital guardian against the constant noise of the internet.

To accurately use this extension: 

1) Activate it by toggling on a button
2) Click 'Settings'
3) Enter websites you want to limit access too. (Enter the whole domain, ex: www.youtube.com)
4) Be Productive!

To grant access to blocked websites, 'Remove' them from 'Settings' or Deactivate the extension.
